packages.name: pipekit
packages.description: A chart to self-host Pipekit. Pipekit is the control plane for Argo Workflows. Platform teams use Pipekit to manage data & CI pipelines at scale, while giving developers self-serve access to Argo. Pipekit's unified logging view, enterprise-grade RBAC, and multi-cluster management capabilities lower maintenance costs for platform teams while delivering a superior devex for Argo users.

packages.name: pipekit-agent
packages.description: A Helm chart for pipekit-agent. Pipekit is the control plane for Argo Workflows. Platform teams use Pipekit to manage data & CI pipelines at scale, while giving developers self-serve access to Argo. Pipekit's unified logging view, enterprise-grade RBAC, and multi-cluster management capabilities lower maintenance costs for platform teams while delivering a superior devex for Argo users. Sign up for a 30-day free trial at pipekit.io/signup.
